result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Rafael Matos

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Rafael Matos in court.  Attorney Maryann Corea in court for Rafael Matos.  Prosecuting attorney M Samir Siddique in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant needs to complete the TAD evaluation. Defendant may qualify for DPA. Case adjourned to Branch 30.
Status conference scheduled for November 16, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Rafael Matos appeared by video.  Attorney Maryann Corea appeared by video for Rafael Matos.  Prosecuting attorney Foley J. Van Lieshout in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a pre-trial conference. Defense is in receipt of discovery. Case may be in DPA posture. TAD evaluation to be scheduled.
Case adjourned.
Status conference scheduled for October 28, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on September 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 2 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Rafael Matos in court with attorney Connor Romenesko.  Defendant Rafael Matos in custody.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Rafael Matos appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  This hearing may be streamed live on Dacast at the Court's discretion: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/76b667a0-98a1-69d4-e783-9185dc35fcc1  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
